# Yandex

## Example

```html
<amp-ad width="300" height="250" type="yandex" data-block-id="R-A-123456-1">
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For semantics of configuration, please see [Yandex's documentation](https://yandex.ru/support/direct/index.html).

### Required parameters

-   `data-block-id`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-data`
-   `data-html-access-allowed`
-   `data-on-render`
-   `data-on-error`
